vlive.korean: 이미 가로로 켰구나! Oh, it's already fixed to horizontal screen. 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Oh, it's already fixed to horizontal screen.

vlive.korean: 가로가 편한가? Should I do this in a vertical way? 듣기 View video NCT : 🎂🎂🎂
vlive.english: Should I do this in a vertical way?

vlive.korean: 가로는 안 돼요? Can't you put the phone sideways? 듣기 View video CIX : 서기의 해외습격🥰
vlive.english: Can't you put the phone sideways?

vlive.korean: 가로로 못 바꾸나? 해볼까? Can't we change? May I try? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 새해부터 에이티니에게 받은 고마운 선물♥️
vlive.english: Can't we change? May I try?

vlive.korean: 너 방송 가로 버전으로 안 틀었니? Didn't you hold it horizontally? 듣기 View video NCT : 19

examples.korean: Meadows bordered the path to the woods. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 숲으로 가는 오솔길 가로는 목초지가 죽 이어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
